text: Bratsberg is an unincorporated community in Fillmore County, in the U.S. state of Minnesota. ==History== A post office was established at Bratsberg in 1862, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1907. The community was named after the county of Bratsberg, in Norway. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Fillmore County, Minnesota Category:1862 establishments in Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Minnesota
title: Bratsberg, Minnesota
